movie.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movie.plot: A New York stockbroker refuses to cooperate in a large securities fraud case involving corruption on Wall Street, corporate banking world and mob infiltration. Based on Jordan Belfort's autobiography.
movie.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 38 wins & 172 nominations.

events.title: Forbes publishes an expose of Jordan Belfort
